title: What Role Do Genetics Play in our Weight?
description:
Is weight gain hereditary? Plus, Jillian’s tips for working legs; and PETA President Ingrid Newkirk talks about her latest book, Animalkind: Remarkable Discoveries About Animals and Revolutionary New Ways to Show Them Compassion. Guest link: PETA.org

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
